nodes.text: Pablo was a male Rodian arms dealer who was based in his pawnshop on Nal Hutta, alongside his Twi'lek helper during the Clone Wars.

When Cad Bane, Moralo Eval, and Obi-Wan Kenobi (disguised as Rako Hardeen) were on the run, they obtained some items from Pablo's shop. When Pablo tried to sell more items to the trio, Bane responded by stating that his supply of blasters was insufficient. When Pablo spoke of their current situation, Bane held his toothpick near Pablo's throat and warned him to keep his mouth shut.
